snippet.title: Scramble Star Crossing - Official Trailer | Six One Indie Showcase
snippet.description: Scramble Star Crossing is a brand new versus puzzle game with a twist! Play across two play areas, matching colorful stars in the night sky. Use your unique star burst, set up mind-blowing chain clears, and top out your opponent by sending Sealed Stars to their board! Check out the trailer to see what to expect from Scramble Star Crossing, coming soon to PC. A demo for Scramble Star Crossing is available now on Steam.
